snippet: In addition, a report said that the number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits touched a two-month high.
abstract: Labor Department reports that its seasonally adjusted Producer Price Index rose 1.7 percent in August, after rising 0.3 percent in July; reports that initial claims for state unemployment benefits rose 15,000 to a seasonally adjusted 382,000 in the previous week.
lead_paragraph: In addition, a report said that the number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits touched a two-month high.

headline.main: Prices Surged for Producers in August
headline.print_headline: Prices Surged For Producers In August
